resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails

Take your experience to next level by playing with colors !
Improve your interaction by placing essential items at your sight !

Enable the new QS tint style
Show charging current, voltage, wattage and battery temperature on lock screen while charging
Customize the statusbar clock and date
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Hide and show clock at regular intervals of time
Modify the shortcuts shown in the lockscreen
When restarting also show options for recovery and bootloader
Set how many actions to show before buttons move to overflow menu
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
Long press volume buttons to switch tracks while screen off
Enable backlight with timeout only on button touch
Prevent interaction with navigation buttons while the screen is being touched
Wake up device if charger is plugged/unplugged
Double tap on lock screen to put the device to sleep
Double tap on statusbar to put the device to sleep
Swipe down with three fingers to take a screenshot
Drag selection on the area you want to take as a screenshot
Control how the device network and gps should behave when the screen is on/off
Actions executed when the screen is turned off
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off
Network mode will be switched to 3G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off
Mobile data will be disabled on screen off
Unlock device with fingerprint after reboot or lockdown
Unlock device with fingerprint after reboot without PIN/Password/Pattern\nNote: You are encrypted so you can\'t use this feature.
Display the number of pending notifications
Always keep notifications expanded. Warning! This feature has known to cause some performance regression in notification panel. Use at your own risk
Hide smart replies to save screen space with peeking notifications
This will hide all force close notifications
Display a notification when android debugging is enabled
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
Blocking alarms have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.
Disable heads up notifications in these applications
Disable heads up from these applications
Block access to certain sensors for some apps to save battery
Significant motion, accelerometer, linear acceleration sensors will be blocked for these apps
Control which status bar icons are shown
From headset if connected and playing music
Hides the global actions menu on secure lockscreen
Display an animation when the device is plugged in
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Short click Volume Down and Power to take partial screenshot
Display roaming indicator in signal icon when in roaming mode
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Quickly disable heads up for all apps but keep them enabled for dialer and messaging apps
Show a kill app button in the notification\'s longpress menu
When the screen is off, long-pressing power button will enable torch
Long press power button while the screen is off to turn on the flashlight
Change volume panel from right side to left side
Configure icon and text styles for the statusbar battery indicator
Show battery percentage in the QS header instead of battery estimate
Show current network traffic levels in the status bar
Show the network traffic indicator arrows
Are you sure you want to reset?
Hide the lock icon on lockscreen
Turns on from sunset till a time
Turns on from a time till sunrise
Show visualizer bars while playing music
Use a smooth lava lamp style color blend animation
Show light pulse on new notification
Show light pulse on new notification using always on
Hide all other display elements from always on
Sets the ambient light animation duration
Set max repeat count. 0 for infinite
Set brightness to use when notifcations are shown
Set brightness to use during ambient display on
Double tap to wake when device is dreaming
In order to add your own icon, select the top left icon and use the OnePlus 6T FP Customizer app to select the icon you want.
Shows an animation while reading your finger
Icons/colors may vary depending on which device you are using.
Disable night light when showing FOD
Disable night light on lockscreen if FOD is active. Disabling this option might affect your fingerprint accuracy with night light on.
They really cut corners with this one
Use default statusbar height in Hide
Useful if the device actually has rounded corners
Force apps to ignore notch space
Please restart the application to apply the changes.
Replace your notifications with a redesigned version of tickers. \nSlim and less invasive than a standard notification
Replace reTicker background color using notification app main color
Save battery by shutting off extra pixels
Enable with battery saver to increase power savings

Smart Pixels is a power saving feature. Depending on how many pixels you decide to turn off, you could see a significant improvement in battery life. For a good user experience, we recommend setting the amount of disabled pixels to 75 percent while shifting every 10 minutes.
Automatically turn on for these apps
Gaming mode will turn on automatically when these apps are opened and turn off when they are closed
Block all headsup messages except calls
Disable hardware buttons when Gaming mode is turned on
Lock screen brightness when Gaming mode is turned on
Try detecting and adding gaming apps automatically
Disable expanding quick settings on secure lock screens
Custom charging symbol for text style
Custom charging symbol near battery percentage text
Allow apps to bypass security systems by pretending to be a different app.
These are power saving features. They may interfere with services intended to run at idle, like navigation apps. You can whitelist these apps from being affected in the app battery settings.
Enter device idle more frequently and wake up less
Restrict apps from running the background
Enable Aggressive Battery automatically when using battery saver
